items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Themes / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [buddha (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/BuddhaDom/zsh-buddha) - Includes decorators for `git` status, current directory, exit status of last command run and username\@hostname.
*   [passion (‚≠ê317)](https://github.com/ChesterYue/ohmyzsh-theme-passion) - Includes decorations for current time, `git` status, last command run time in milliseconds, and the exit status of the last command. Requires coreutils on macOS.
items.content_html:
Themes / superconsole - Windows-only

  • buddha (‚≠ê0) - Includes decorators for git status, current directory, exit status of last command run and username@hostname.
  • passion (‚≠ê317) - Includes decorations for current time, git status, last command run time in milliseconds, and the exit status of the last command. Requires coreutils on macOS.

items.title: Awesome Terraform
items.content_text:
### Tools / Community providers

*   [fuzzy-terraform-rm (‚≠ê37)](https://github.com/paololazzari/fuzzy-terraform-rm) - A fuzzy-finder command-line tool for removing resources from terraform state.
items.content_html:
Tools / Community providers

  • fuzzy-terraform-rm (‚≠ê37) - A fuzzy-finder command-line tool for removing resources from terraform state.

items.title: Awesome Docker
items.content_text:
### Container Composition

*   [rocker-compose (‚≠ê410)](https://github.com/grammarly/rocker-compose) :skull: - Docker composition tool with idempotency features for deploying apps composed of multiple containers. By[@grammarly](https://github.com/grammarly).
*   [rocker (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/grammarly/rocker) :skull: - Extended Dockerfile builder. Supports multiple FROMs, MOUNTS, templates, etc. by [@grammarly](https://github.com/grammarly).

### Orchestration

*   [Swarm-cronjob (‚≠ê819)](https://github.com/crazy-max/swarm-cronjob) - Create jobs on a time-based schedule on Swarm by [@crazy-max](https://github.com/crazy-max)

### Security

*   [Deepfence Enterprise](https://deepfence.io) :heavy\_dollar\_sign: - Full life cycle Cloud Native Workload Protection platform for kubernetes, virtual machines and serverless. By [@deepfence](https://github.com/deepfence)
*   [Deepfence Threat Mapper (‚≠ê5k)](https://github.com/deepfence/ThreatMapper) - Powerful runtime vulnerability scanner for kubernetes, virtual machines and serverless. By [@deepfence](https://github.com/deepfence)

### Service Discovery

*   [istio (‚≠ê37k)](https://github.com/istio/istio) - An open platform to connect, manage, and secure microservices by [@istio](https://github.com/istio)

### Terminal / CLI tools

*   [Pdocker (‚≠ê6)](https://github.com/g31s/Pdocker) - A simple tool to manage and maintain Docker for personal projects by [@g31s](https://github.com/g31s)

### Dockerfile / Other

*   [@0xy](https://gitlab.com/0xy/dockerfiles)

### Registry / Other

*   [Cloudsmith :heavy\_dollar\_sign:](https://cloudsmith.com/product/formats/docker-registry) - A fully managed package management SaaS, with first-class support for public and private Docker registries (and many others, incl. Helm charts for the Kubernetes ecosystem). Has a generous free-tier and is also completely free for open-source.
*   [Sonatype Nexus Repository](https://www.sonatype.com/products/sonatype-nexus-repository) - Manage binaries and build artifacts across your software supply chain.

### CI/CD / Other

*   [Diun (‚≠ê3.7k)](https://github.com/crazy-max/diun) - Receive notifications when an image or repository is updated on a Docker registry by [@crazy-max](https://github.com/crazy-max).

### Testing / Other

*   [EZDC (‚≠ê12)](https://github.com/lynchborg/ezdc) - Golang test harness for easily setting up tests that rely on services in a docker-compose.yml. By [@byrnedo](https://github.com/byrnedo)
items.content_html:
Container Composition

  • rocker-compose (‚≠ê410) üíÄ - Docker composition tool with idempotency features for deploying apps composed of multiple containers. By@grammarly.
  • rocker (‚≠ê1.3k) üíÄ - Extended Dockerfile builder. Supports multiple FROMs, MOUNTS, templates, etc. by @grammarly.
